set.name: DM-34+1S Cross Generation Plus One Super

card.name: Bolbalzak "Sword Flash" Dragon, Blue Divine Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Each turn, you may untap this creature the first time it is tapped. ■ This creature can't be blocked.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-34+1S Cross Generation Plus One Super

property.name: Rules
Set
property.value: DM-34+1S Cross Generation Plus One Super

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may un-link one of your linked Gods in the battle zone that have the names Zen and Aku. If you do, each player puts all cards in their hand and mana zone into their deck and shuffles it. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When this creature would leave the battle zone, if you have at least one God in the battle zone, this creature stays in the battle zone instead.
